UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design and Evaluation of Short Bovine Lactoferrin-Derived Antimicrobial Peptides against Multidrug-Resistant Enterococcus faecium.
Literature.Author: Mishra B, Felix L, Basu A, Kollala SS, Chhonker YS, Ganesan N, Murry DJ, Mylonakis E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium C68(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium C68(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium C68(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium C68(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis V583(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis OG1RF(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MMH594(MIC=>32µg/ml)
